author: The Record
title: Opera at bergenPAC on Sunday - Music
text:
MUSIC: Singer from Ridgewood in opera lead at bergenPAC 
Ridgewood coloratura soprano Hea-Ran Kim will perform the title role on Sunday in Gaetano Donizetti's tragic, dramatic opera "Lucia Di Lammermoor" in the bel canto style for the conclusion of the New Jersey Association of Verismo Opera's 26th season. 3 p.m., Bergen Performing Arts Center, 30 N. Van Brunt St., Englewood. $29 to $59. Information: 201-227-1030, bergenpac.org.
â€” Christina Joseph
